title: Las Vegas Sands Forms New Group Aimed at Promoting Improvements in Southern Nevada Education System ...
text: ( Source : Las Vegas Sands Corporation ) Newly formed Sands Education Council unites like-minded organizations to bring awareness to public education challenges LAS VEGAS - Oct. 13, 2015 - Las Vegas Sands Corp. ( NYSE : LVS ) today announced
